Header: Opposition Leader attends religious ceremony at Bellanwila
Content: The religious ceremony in connection with the first death anniversary of venerable Prof. Bellanwila Wimalarathana Nayaka thera was held at the Bellanwila Raja Maha Viharaya. Opposition Leader Mahinda Rajapakse, former Defence Secretary Gotabhaya Rajapakse and MP Gamini Lokuge were present on the occasion. After participating in the alms giving to 100 Buddhist monks, the Opposition Leader expressed his views to the media. He said that they are prepared to contest any election.
